name: strong
features: Double Reinforced Palm: Offers superior feel & durability while remaining soft
0.9mm Cabretta Leather: Softest leather for great feel
Double Inverse Cuff: Increased wrist support, injury protection & power
Superior Craftsmanship: Handmade for buttery soft & durable gloves
Designed to Fit: No unnecessary stitching for max durability
Built for T-Ball : Designed specifically to keep young players comfortable & focused during games
Moisture Management : Nike Dri-FIT technology wicks away sweat for quicker evaporation & lasting comfort
Comfort Fit : Smooth material creates a soft, comfortable feel on hands
Durable Construction : Built to withstand repeated use during practices & games
Material Composition :
Palm: 55% polyester / 45% polyurethane
Back: 61% polyester / 26% nylon / 13% spandex
Other: 97% nylon / 2% polyester / 1% polyurethane
Chrome/Grey palm: stylish and sleek design for a premium look
Double Inverse Cuff Technology: provides a locked-in, secure fit
Upgraded double-reinforced palm: enhances durability and longevity
Upgraded Lycra between fingers and knuckles: improves flexibility and comfort
Upgraded thread: increases overall glove durability and strength
Inverse stitching on fingers: reduces friction for a smoother, more natural feel
Raised and stitched Bolt logo: adds a signature, high-quality touch
Made from 0.9mm - 1.1mm Cabretta leather: ensures exceptional softness and grip
